about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack of "Into the Deep Dark Green Sleep"
A story woven with the sound of rain, poetic text, and gentle narration...
A short visual novel where you can spend a relaxing moment in your own place, with time to yourself, where no one will disturb you, no one will come barging in.
It could be a small, secretive café.

This soundtrack features the theme song by Hota Kakeru, including the latest guitar-arranged version, the original piano-and-vocal version used only in the early build of the game, and instrumental tracks of each version.

It could be a small, secretive café.
